projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive web-based system for managing employee records, attendance, payroll, and performance tracking. Designed for efficiency and ease of use.
challenges_faced: Ensuring real-time attendance tracking with minimal latency.
Implementing secure and role-based access control.
Optimizing performance when handling large employee datasets.
potential_improvements: Integrate AI-driven analytics for better performance evaluation.
Improve UI/UX for smoother navigation and user experience.

projects.title: Language Exchange Platform
projects.description: An interactive platform that connects language learners with native speakers for practice through chat, video calls, and gamified lessons.
challenges_faced: Managing real-time communication and chat synchronization.
Ensuring a seamless user experience during video calls.
Handling different languages and text formatting properly.
potential_improvements: Introduce AI-based language correction and suggestions.
Enhance video call stability with better WebRTC integration.
Implement a points-based reward system for gamification.

projects.title: Career Up Consultancy
projects.description: A career guidance and job-matching platform that helps users connect with mentors, access resources, and apply for jobs in their field.
challenges_faced: Matching job seekers with mentors based on skillset and interest.
Ensuring a user-friendly interface for career guidance resources.
Managing job application tracking and updates in real time.
potential_improvements: Introduce AI-based resume analysis and feedback.
Expand job-matching capabilities with ML-based recommendations.
Add more interactive career assessment tools.

projects.title: Bistro Boss Restaurant
projects.description: A modern restaurant management system with online reservations, menu browsing, and a dynamic ordering system to enhance customer experience.
challenges_faced: Ensuring smooth UI/UX for a seamless ordering process.
Managing different user roles (customers, staff, admin).
potential_improvements: Implement AI-based menu recommendations based on user behavior.
Improve order tracking with real-time notifications.
